Some say that they get a hint of buttermilk battering while others get more of the crumbly fried batter, but everyone agrees that this flavoring brings back memories of the old fashioned donuts of yesteryear." / Flavor Profile:  Old fashioned, deep-fried, buttermilk doughnut flavor with just a hint of cinnamon: 5-15%

​

Considerations: Can be easily overpowered by other flavors

Link: [Old Fashioned Donut Flavor Concentrate](https://www.nicvape.com/old-fashioned-donut-eliquid-flavoring-concentrate)

Single Flavor Test:  9%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton
